    • Method Detail

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard(Player currentPlayer)
        Checks if the currentPlayer can buy a development card. The resources needed are one ore, wool, and grain
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is buying the development card during their turn
        Returns:
        True if currentPlayer can buy a development card, False if not
        Precondition:
        buyDevCard(Player) calls this function currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer buys a random development card and returns the required resources to the bank or deck.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is buying the development card during their turn.
        Precondition:
        The player calls this method during their turn when they want to buy a development card. The method canBuyDevCard(Player) returns a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        The currentPlayer gets a random development card

      • canUseDevCard

        public boolean canUseDevCard(Player currentPlayer)
        Checks to see if the currentPlayer can use a development card. A player can use only one development card during their turn and that card cannot be bought and used on the same turn Note: Only victory point cards can be played on the same turn, though they can only be played when the player has a total of 10 victory points
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        True if the player can use a development card, False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by canUseDevCard(Player) currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useDevCard

        public void useDevCard(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses the development card and discards it. This method calls other methods that relate to the individual cards
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Precondition:
        This method is called when the player uses a development card canUseDevCard(Player) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        This calls another method that is connected to the development card action The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game

      • useSoldierCard

        public void useSoldierCard(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses the Soldier development card
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useDevCard(Player) when the card to be used is a Soldier card
        Postcondition:
        The robber is activated The card cannot be reused for the rest of the game If applicable, the currentPlayer gets the Largest Army card

      • canUseVictoryPointCards

        public boolean canUseVictoryPointCards(Player currentPlayer)
        Does the currentPlayer have 10 victory points, including the unplayed victory point cards. This method takes the currentPlayer's current victory points and adds the unplayed victory point cards to see if they equal 10
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        True if the total victory point count is 10 (or more), False otherwise
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useVictoryPointCards(Player)
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useVictoryPointCards

        public void useVictoryPointCards(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses all of their the Victory Point development cards. This can only be played when the currentPlayer's total victory points equal 10, including unplayed victory point cards
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useDevCard(Player) when the card to be used is a Victory Point card The method canUseVictoryPointCards(Player) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        Played victory point cards add points to the currentPlayer's visible victory point count The card cannot be reused for the rest of the game

      • canUseRoadBuildingCard

        public boolean canUseRoadBuildingCard(Player currentPlayer)
        This method checks if the currentPlayer have 2 roads that are not placed on the map.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        True if the currentPlayer has 2 roads that are not placed on the map, False otherwise
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useRoadBuildingCard(Player).
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useRoadBuildingCard

        public void useRoadBuildingCard(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses the Road Building development card. The currentPlayer places 2 roads down
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useDevCard(Player) when the card to be used is a Road Building card The method canUseRoadBuildingCard(Player) returns a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        Place 2 roads on the map according to the rules of placing roads The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game If applicable, the currentPlayer gets the Longest Road card

      • canUseYearOfPlentyCard

        public boolean canUseYearOfPlentyCard(Player currentPlayer,
                                      ResourceType resourceType1,
                                      ResourceType resourceType2)
        Are the requested resourceType1 and resourceType2 available to draw?
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        resourceType1 - The first resource desired by the currentPlayer
        resourceType2 - The second resource desired by the currentPlayer
        Returns:
        True if both resourceType1 and resourceType2 are available, False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useYearOfPlentyCard(Player, ResourceType, ResourceType) resourceType1 and resourceType2 are not null
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useYearOfPlentyCard

        public void useYearOfPlentyCard(Player currentPlayer,
                                ResourceType resourceType1,
                                ResourceType resourceType2)
        The currentPlayer uses the Year of Plenty development card. The currentPlayer draws 2 resources of the currentPlayer's choice
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        resourceType1 - The first resource desired by the currentPlayer
        resourceType2 - The second resource desired by the currentPlayer
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useDevCard(Player) when the card to be used is a Year of Plenty card The method canUseYearOfPlentyCard(Player, ResourceType, ResourceType) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        Draw 2 resource cards of the currentPlayer's choice, as long as the cards are available The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game

      • useMonopolyCard

        public void useMonopolyCard(Player currentPlayer,
                            ResourceType monopolyType)
        The currentPlayer uses the Monopoly development card. The currentPlayer declares one resource card and all other players give the currentPlayer all resources of that same resource
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        monopolyType - The resource type that the currentPlayer wants
        Precondition:
        This method is called by useDevCard(Player) when the card to be used is a Monopoly card
        Postcondition:
        The currentPlayer declares one resource card and all other players give the currentPlayer all resources of that same resource type The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game
